name: Xcel VentX Print Long Sleeve Top - Women's
description: Have a little fun with your sun protection. Made for performance paddlers, dragon boaters and athletes working it hard. It’s lightweight, quick-drying and breathable, and the relaxed t-shirt fit makes it comfortable to wear on the shore.Moisture-wicking polyester and spandex has 4-way stretch.Rated UPF30 and blocks 96% of UVA/UVB radiation from the sun.Thumbholes help keep the sleeves from riding up when wrestling with the surf.Raglan sleeves keep the shoulders from bunching up when paddling.
